overview: Story of a family man who is frustrated with his frumpy wife, then embarks on affair with a random woman he meets, putting the stability of his home in a serious jeopardy. Written and Produced by Nestor Orji. Featuring: Ik Ogbonna, Frederick Leonard, Nancy Isime, MaryAnn Nweke. A must watch for singles and married persons.
title: A Better Family
